item.title: Custom Header With Hide on Scroll Down & Show on Scroll Up
item.description: Have you ever wondered if it’s possible to customize the header of your Shopify store to something more robust and professional, the answer is big yes! That’s what we are going to see in this article tutorial. Also I encourage you to watch the whole video on YouTube, so you can use this custom header easily and If you are not using Minimal theme and you want this header on your Shopify store then DM me on Instagram so I can create it for you.

item.title: Advanced Slider for your Shopify store
item.description: Product Sliders allows showing all suggested products friendly that match to customer’s expectation via a responsive slider. This product slider you’re going to see is full of advanced features such as sale and sold out badges also change product picture on hover effect and more! so if you like this tutorial please share it with your friends. so let’s get started From your Shopify admin, go to Online Store > Themes.

item.title: How to add the Parallax section in your Shopify
item.description: In this tutorial article we will be adding a parallax section with fixed scrolling using HTML and CSS and LIQUID. You will see that when you scroll the image inside the section will stay in place, so let me show you how to add it to your Shopify store. From your Shopify admin, go to Online Store > Themes. Find the Minimal theme, and then click Actions > Duplicate. Find the theme that called Copy of Minimal then click Actions > Edit Code.

item.title: Customize & add product badges
item.description: There are many ways to attach visitor’s attention to a product. One of the most popular ways is by adding a small badge, usually on the top left or right corner of the product image. In this article I’m going to show you how to create a simple NEW and HOT icon badge for a product with the help of Metafields and also how to customize the Sale & Soldout badge in the Minimal theme, so let’s get started!

item.title: Products carousel slider for Shopify
item.description: Product Sliders allows showing all suggested products friendly that match to customer’s expectation via a responsive slider. You can create many product sliders as featured, bestsellers, new arrival products or anything else that you want your customers to see in your store. Also you can create many product sliders that you want to attract customers to make a purchase from your website without any apps, so let me show you step by step

item.title: Displaying custom author names using custom fields
item.description: By default, Shopify themes will display a blog post author based on staff admin accounts but it’s possible to edit the article template and display any author name you would like with the help of custom fields. So let me show you how to feature a guest blogger who you would like to credit as the author From your Shopify admin, go to Online Store > Themes. Find the Minimal theme, and then click Actions > Duplicate.

item.title: How to add accordion to your minimal theme
item.description: An “accordion” is a great way to display Products descriptions to your ecommerce store, since it allows the user to quickly and easily browse your Product informations without much scrolling. And luckily, it’s simple and easy to add one to your store! Let me show you how From your Shopify admin, go to Online Store > Themes. Find the Minimal theme, and then click Actions > Duplicate. Find the theme that called Copy of Minimal then click Actions > Edit Code.
